website_summaries.verdict: The best option for a commercial feel. A great choice when you know the table is going to face some abuse.
pros: Commercial grade construction makes one of the most stable and durable tables you will buy
Supports a massive amount of weight
cons: Won't fit in smaller spaces or rooms

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced, but a stellar product.  Is it worth the extra $$$?
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy and lightweight table. This is a very very nice addition to our portable setup for company (game night...etc.) I took a star away only because of the price (AND THE FACT THAT I HAD TO BE AT HOME TO SIGN FOR IT?????) I think the price is way bloated. It is not a $300 table, so only buy this if you REALLY don't have a problem over-spending occasionally. This is an over-spend, but you do get a freaking nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this table. I ordered two of the 6-foot tables for use in my home office/sewing room. They are wonderful, sturdy surfaces for organizing my space and providing room to spread out craft and/or sewing projects. The design of the folding legs is by far superior to similar tables I have seen. Although some tables may be less expensive, they all have struts and braces underneath that would interfere with a user's legroom and/or storage space. This table is designed so you could easily sit at the ends and be perfectly comfortable. They are well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Table nice - packaging could be better
customer_reviews.text: Decent table. Came with a ding in the top. Could have been packaged better. Like how the legs are. The color is nice - a lighter brown, almost a darker beige. I was expecting a darker brown.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Horizon

customer_reviews.title: Table, as expected, didn't ship well
customer_reviews.text: The table seems really nice so far. It just arrived yesterday. It's very sturdy and well built, looks nice. But it did get beat up a bit during shipping. There are three dents pushed into the edge on one of the long sides of the table, where there must've been pressure points when lifted or during transit. The plastic has white colored archs at each of the dented spots from the plastic deforming.
customer_reviews.author: Augie linskens

customer_reviews.title: which I am not happy about it because they ship it like that and ...
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is very well made, yet elegant....unfortunately it came with a major dent in one of the corners, was packed inside of two boxes and exterior damage, which I am not happy about it because they ship it like that and I really need this table and I don't have the time to return it now, but I highly recommend it. .
customer_reviews.author: Cornel I. Plescan

customer_reviews.title: VERY Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, does not wobble or shake like others; expensive but definitely worth the money if you have something valuable to put on it. I bought it for my son's video streaming venture to support his computer, screen, camera, microphone, etc. and it is rock solid with absolutely no concerns about anything falling off.
customer_reviews.author: ChefJim51

customer_reviews.title: Ideas being tabled
customer_reviews.text: well constructed, sturdy, and reasonably priced for the quality. Also, the best table on the market as you can expand by connecting other tables creating a bigger work surface.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Table! Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great table: very sturdy, well-constructed, thoughtful design, good value. Had a problem through no fault of company. Customer service was attentive and courteous and promptly resolved the situation 100% to my satisfaction. I wish all Amazon sellers were this respectful and professional! Ordered chairs (also excellent) and awaiting an additional table.
customer_reviews.author: Control Delete

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy but definitely gray, not grown as indicated
customer_reviews.text: This table is great overall. Very solid and strong. Table ends have wide legs which allow for chairs to fit well on the ends. Nice feature. The ability to interlock with other tables is also great. Only complaint is the advertised brown color is not brown. Definitely gray, which makes it feel cold and institutional, not warm and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: It appears that these tables have a habit of arriving with defects
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three 6 foot tables and for some reason two arrived before the third. All three tables had some sort of damage, all of it looked like it was manufacturer defects. The hard plastic tops had edges/corners that looked "melted"/bent/"squished" and one had a dent in the top of the table. The company was very quick to respond and thankfully refunded me all the money and I did not have to return the tables. I only had to send photos the first time I complained. I opened an art studio, so thankfully the tables will be covered most of the time, but they were $100+ each-so very glad they refunded my money! They are very sturdy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ourcade

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived so I can't comment on its durability but it is a good looking, solid table. I think that six is the most number of people that could be seated around the 6 foot table for a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Love these versatile tables!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 48” x 30” version of these sturdy folding tables. Don’t miss the video showing add-ons available! We also bought two sets of folding corner tables that give us even more layout options. Who knew folding tables could be so much fun?
customer_reviews.author: kgm

customer_reviews.title: we returned and got better unit, it was a hassle but the table ...
customer_reviews.text: First unit we received was defective from the manufacture, we returned and got better unit, it was a hassle but the table seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: A good, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I get this out when I have more guests than my regular table can hold. It's rather heavy, but that's a good thing once it's set up; it doesn't wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for “light” work
customer_reviews.text: Nice folding table. Legs are sturdy but the top seems as though it could “fold” in the middle with too much weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Designed for strength, color, usability
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic color and sturdiness. Looking forward to some great dinner parties.
customer_reviews.author: CAT Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I use this table every time I have a large crowd for family dinners. It is sturdy and easy to put us. Will last me forever. Fits six people comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to support 50-pound load without wobbles. Perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: L L

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tables. They are as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Table hardware design should allow easy sitting on each end of table if needed. Currently considering additional purchases in 2020.
customer_reviews.author: dog7

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong table and nice color. Really like it for entertaining. Fits 6 comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: maxie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. We wanted a wider 4 foot length folding table, very sturdy, and this is perfect. It is being used as a common desk/workspace and we had problems with the lighter weight tables getting tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: D Calvin

customer_reviews.title: This table seems very well built and will be easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I am planning a large family get-together for next summer and need to be able to accommodate a lot of food. I think this table will do the trick. It also folds up and is easy to store away in the meanwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie L. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Size and price *rock
customer_reviews.text: The table's surface and legs are great quality. My only problem is there is some side to side flex, meaning if you bump it it *rocks a bit, but not too bad, especually at its size and price!
customer_reviews.author: SlayedOver

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong table
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four out of five stars because it arrived with a dent in the table. We needed it right away, so we kept it. But it is sturdy and appears to be well built. It must have taken quite a hit to be dinged up the way it was. The table was easy to set up and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Church

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and fold down. Sturdy and easy to clean. A good choice.
customer_reviews.author: CO Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but they're not brown
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but removing a star because it says they're brown in the description, but they're clearly gray
customer_reviews.author: Staza

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy! Really like the size - the width especially. I purchased two and used them as extension to my dining room table at Christmas- perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy commercial grade. We got them along with 6’ tables so they could be customized for different sized conferences that we hold in our office. They have an attaching mechanism so the tables can be joined. Furthermore, the ends of these tables are open so we can seat people all around in our limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Spielholz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, love the end seating of this design; and it's one of the only tables I've searched for that fits perfectly up to our regular dining table of the same height at 30" (Many are only 29") .
customer_reviews.author: rkbird

customer_reviews.title: Best Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy table. There is no wobble and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move but very sturdy. Perfect extra table for parties and activities! Thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CaraC

customer_reviews.title: really good table
customer_reviews.text: This is a good table it's belt very good and is very sturdy well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Ward Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great table with multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I wanted something sturdier than the usual banquet table. I also like the leg placement for chairs. I ordered a second table, placed side by side, we will have a huge LEGO play area!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: My Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is unbelieveable! I set it up on my very plush expensive carpet and even put sliders under it. All that's on it is my laptop, printer, lamp and a small container for pens, etc. The table doesn't shimmy....no movement at all. It's as solid as a rock! I love it , it's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Work or Dining Table. Excellent color and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: lou hunt

customer_reviews.title: This table is solid
customer_reviews.text: Good materials, solid build, no wobble, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: pflyin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. Well made and very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dillon

customer_reviews.title: The tables provide a great place to gather without smashing your knees on middle ...
customer_reviews.text: Tables are stirdy and though. The tables provide a great place to gather without smashing your knees on middle supports.
customer_reviews.author: RAbreo

customer_reviews.title: these tables are amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: tired of sitting at the end of the table and banging your legs against the pesky legs. these tables are amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: hawkman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good table except having minor damage on the surface. still works for my purpose
customer_reviews.author: ey

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this table easy to move and is really nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I use this heavy duty table for electronic projects and it works well solid with no movement while working would recommend
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Not wobbly at all. Perfect for game night or extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: It would be a nice table if it was possible to receive it undamaged. Good luck with that.
customer_reviews.text: Might be a decent table. Won't know because it arrived trashed and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rusch

customer_reviews.title: ZOWN Commercial 72” (6 ft.) 300 lb
customer_reviews.text: All went well with delivery. It's a great fit for my craft room:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy table overall
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented slightly on one edge. Very sturdy table overall.
customer_reviews.author: Meghyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Great table, can load it full with food for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table,can load it full with food for Christmas,very stout,love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: The tables themselves are good quality and as advertised. Just a shame they were not transported more carefully.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but it was delivered damaged. two of the corners were crushed in. Before opening the boxes I could see that it may have a problem. I wish I was savvy with my camera and could upload photos. Dont know how to proceed from here. I HATE returning things, I am a senior, and I had to hire someone to carry the tables (yes, I ordered two, and both are damaged) into my craft room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, but corners were dented in shipping
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, but corners were dented in shipping.I should have returned the table but needed it for Christmas and not enough time.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. King

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I immediately ordered another.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my workshop and bought a second one about 2 days after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Will Work For Intended Use
customer_reviews.text: Minor manufacturing defect as one reviewer previously posted. There is a raised bubble on one of the corners, which for the price is annoying. Not worth the energy to return and need it for Christmas in 2 days so will just live with it. That said it's very sturdy and should hold up well. I like it doesn't fold down the center so don't need to worry about things tipping in the crease.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table, my only complaint would be it looks more grey than brown.
customer_reviews.author: Sally H

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and sits 8 people
customer_reviews.text: extra long single table for our small lunchroom. sturdy and sits 8 people. no bar so sittings at the end of the table is unrestricted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minor manufacturing defects
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was not damaged, so the two bumps on the top edge of the table are manufacturing defects. Not worth returning or dealing with an exchange, but disappointing that the table has two 1/2 to 3/4 " bubbles on two edges that are not due to shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Welsch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for a crescent table too mach it .
customer_reviews.author: John LaConte

customer_reviews.title: This IS NOT a folding table. This is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This IS NOT a folding table. This is a fixed length 6' table with folding legs. The table is well constructed and very stable. BUT, if what you want is a folding table do not purchase this. Not sure why the seller, and Amazon, would not have picked up on this very important distinction.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nothing wrong with the table itself, just thought when i purchased it that the table would fold in half
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table
customer_reviews.text: it is sturdy. I am using it for a sewing table/dining table when I have company. I love that you can seat people at the ends without having their legs hit a bar. I bought the 6 feet long table and the width is just right .
customer_reviews.author: beverly tenkman

customer_reviews.title: Late and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came too late after our party and with several bumps...
customer_reviews.author: suncoma

customer_reviews.title: Cosco Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. Quick shipment and sturdy. More than I expected. Perfect for the crafts that I do.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Steele

product_meta.title: ZOWN Premium Commercial 72” (6 ft) Round Blow Mold Banquet Folding Table, Brown
product_meta.description: Style Name:Round| Size:6 ftZOWN Premium Collection 72" round heavy duty blow mold folding table constructed of high-density polyethylene and a powder coated steel structure redefines the market for lightweight, folding tables. Featuring a manual lock, long lasting rivets, and ANSI/BIFMA testing, this table is built for long term commercial use. Square section legs combined with a beveled table top and a warm brown color, finish the elegant yet simple aesthetic appearance for this table. The table has a 300 lb. use rate, and a 1200 lb. evenly distributed static load. Distributed by COSCO Commercial Products.
feature_bullets: Meets ANSI/BIFMA Standards - limited 10 year warranty
300 lb. use rate, with a 3000 lb. evenly distributed static load.
Sturdy and Durable: The manual lock and long-lasting rivets make the table more stable
Color-fading resistant UV Protected high-density resin with a durable coated steel frame for indoor/outdoor use
Easy to Store: Individual Polypropylene clips help to hold the legs of the powder-coated steel structure in the closed position when folded

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
